Name: Penthouse Cocktail
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: A bourbon sour with a touch of maraschino adding an almondy cherry note.
History: Created by Carl Wrangel at the Oak Room, Copenhagen, Denmark.
Nutrition: One serving of Penthouse Cocktail contains 219 calories
